HYdras:

"Stop the chit chat you impertinent and foolish Autobot" said Hydr=
as while He spat agaisnts Tucson " You the autobots Speakt too much...." Hy=
dras moved aroudn slowly and hissed "He is in our side now, Perseus underst=
ood that, if he had the half of the courage that the firs autobots had he h=
adent negociated with us and leave Rodimus at his fate... now is too late f=
or him and for you"

With a Sudden movement Hydras trasforfed to hes beast =
mode, a 5 head hydra. he spread his five heads towards Tuscon grabin with 2=
 of them Tucson's arms while two more attempred to grabe his legs




From:=
 Sandy 
Sent: Friday, February 19, 2010 10:27 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com=
 
Subject: Re: Recovering Rodimus/BlackFortress


  
Tucson had no idea wha=
t was happening to him. Hydras reply comes as a shock to the Autobot, as he=
 gives a blank look all of a sudden. He could not answer his question witho=
ut hesitation in his voice.

" As - as far as I know, I - I... I - don't th=
ink I'm related to him. I deeply admire him, yes, but I honestly do not thi=
nk I'm related to him."

His deeply hidden power of his spark recedes and q=
uickly returns him to his regular height. He had no notion of how to contro=
l it, nor had he known what it was. As it reverses, he suddenly feels a goo=
d portion of power leave his body, yet, he was not about to abandon the act=
 of defending himself against Hydras or Rodimus for that matter. 

" Power =
or no power, you've abducted one of my own, and turned him into your evil p=
awn. No matter the consequence, I will stand my ground and do whatever it t=
akes to rightfully return my leader to his role as the commander of the Aut=
obots. Even if I have to saccrifice my own spark to accomplish my mission. =
That is why I'm here, not for power, not for lust, not for domination. I'm =
here because know it or not, someone who was once very close to me, needs m=
y help and I never turn my hand away when a fellow comrade is in grave dang=
er. I'm sure you would do the same for one of your own." 

He turns to Rodi=
mus. 

" If I do not succeed this time, I will suffer my defeat honorably. =
I will fall many times if I have to. But rest assured Rodimus, when the tim=
e is right, and you finally reach out to me, I promise my hand will be ther=
e to reach out to you. And when I do, I won't let go. I promise, I will not=
 abandon you or this cause. As dark as you are now, you may not understand,=
 but hopefully one day, you will." 

He then turns back to Hydras.

" All r=
ight Hydras, I'll let you decide how you wish to fight. After all, this is =
your domain, and I am an intruder here. " 

Deep down Tucson wished he coul=
d avoid a scuffle. He wished he could just bargain with Hydras but after se=
eing that he was a combination of Megatron and Galvatron, that made for a d=
ifferent situation all together. To him, Decepticons were still his enemies=
. He was however still taken aback by Hydra's question. While he looks to H=
ydras he thinks to himself once more.

" Me? Related to Optimus Prime?"

--=
- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, <airly2002@...> wrote:
>
> Hydras:
> Hydras st=
ood up slowly in a non treaten way, and camly walked a round the Scene watc=
hing the battle when Tucson looked like more like Optimus and he said "Yess=
s, this will be like the old good times... tell me Scrappling, what's your =
relation with My old Pal, Optimus Prime?" said hydras with a remarcable iro=
nic mocking tone in the word pal 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> From: Super Cyclonus 
> Sen=
t: Friday, February 19, 2010 11:24 AM
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
> Subje=
ct: Re: Recovering Rodimus/BlackFortress
> 
> 
> 
> The battle was not what=
 it seemed . . . 
> 
> The punch Rodimus had thrown, the one that was so ea=
sily blocked by Tuscon, would have shocked Rodimus had it landed. He would =
have been glad to be rid of this annoyance, yes, but it would have been som=
ewhat disappointing as well. 
> 
> So when Rodimus was spun around by Tusco=
n, the Autobot may have missed the wicked smile on his face, When Tuscon tr=
ied to ram Rodimus into a wall, he may not have noticed that the sound of c=
runching metal was not Rodimus' but the reinrorced wall shearing and tearin=
g under the force of the assault. It was not the sound of Rodimkus' defeat =
that resonated through the room, but it was something else!
> 
> Many of th=
e same teachers that had instructed Tuscon had trained a young Hot Rod as w=
ell - Jazz, Prowl, Brawn, Kup, even Optimus himself! And while Rodimus no l=
onger clearly remembered all these ones and what they had meant to him, thi=
er lessons were still ground into him, and his reflexes that had been honed=
 over the years of battle! 
> 
> Also, this was no young Hot Rod that stood=
 there before them, but a figure shapped by the energy of the matrix into a=
 character of leadership, power and ability. He no longer had access to the=
 knowledge and wisdom of the matrix, the energy having been stripped from h=
im. But that power that had been imparted was still there, reconfigured by =
the power of the predacon shell program! He was faster, stronger and far mo=
re durable then Hot Rod ever was, he was DARK RODIMUS!
> 
> So when Rodimus=
 hit the wall it was not truely pain that he felt, but the elation that a t=
rue battle was in the making. He felt that charge that all warriors felt wh=
en they faced a foe that had some metal! It was an eagerness twisted by Pre=
dacon programming into something dark and loathsome. 
> 
> So when he stood=
 and turned around it was not defeat in his stance but derision, "So you fa=
ncy yourself to be a Prime do you, scrappling?" Rodimus said his tone still=
 mocking as he raised his arm, smiling as his optics glowing with energy, "=
Well let's see what you got!" With a thought he fired a blast of plasma ene=
rgy from his arm mounted cannon at this new incarnation of Tuscon, who for =
the moment appeared to be posturing for Hydras!
> 
> OOC: Remember, the mat=
rix that is housed within Rodimus has no energy of its own, only the housin=
g. It does not have the power to reach out and transform anyone, although I=
 do have some ideas. I am not sure if you want to redo your post, or let it=
 go as it stands. 
> 
> Preston
> (Cyclonus/Scourge/Dark rodimus)
>
